botinfo.description: This command shows you info about myself.

help.about:
{{- name }} is a bot with focus on moderation, utility, server management, and more Discord based stuff!
My prefix in this server is: `{{- prefix }}`! To change it, use the **{{- prefix }}prefix <prefix>** command.
To view more info about each command type: `{{- prefix }}help <command>`
help.commandUndefined: This command does not exist or is disabled

prefix.description: This command sets my prefix on the server the command was used!
prefix.multiCharacters: My new prefix can\'t have more than 15 characters!
prefix.success: My prefix on this server has been changed to: `{{- prefix }}`
prefix.failed:
Sadly, something wen't wrong while trying to update the server's prefix!
Please, try again later.
prefix.alreadySet: My prefix was already set to **{{- prefix }}** on this server!

servericon.description: This command shows the server icon.
servericon.text: Click [here]({{- guildIconURL }}) to download the icon!

uptime.description: This command shows the time I've been up for.
uptime.onlineFor: I have been online for: **{{- duration }}**

ping.description: This command shows the latency of the bot.

serverinfo.description: This command shows info about the server.
serverinfo.name: Name
verificationDetails: Must have a verified email on their Discord account.
Must be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes.
Must be a member of the server for longer than 10 minutes.
Must have a verified phone on their Discord account.

addemoji.description: This command allows you to create emojis.
addemoji.noNameLink: You either didn't specify the link of the emoji or the name of it.
addemoji.nameTooBig: The name for the emoji you provided was too big.
addemoji.nameTooShort: The name for the emoji you provided was too short.
addemoji.invalidName: Please, note that the emoji name can only have letters, numbers or underscores.
addemoji.invalidURL: The URL you provided was not a valid url.
addemoji.emojiCreated: The {{- emoji }} emoji has been created!
addemoji.error: There was an error when creating the emoji.
addemoji.cancelled: The emoji creation has been cancelled.
addemoji.waitingResponse: If you want to create the emoji, send "**confirm**", else, send "**cancel**"

clear.description: This command clears messages from the chat.
clear.invalidValue: Please, give a value between 2 and 100!
clear.deleted: {{- amount }} messages have been deleted by {{- author }}.
clear.error: Something wen't wrong when deleting the messages.

userinfo.description: This command shows info about the user.

ban.description: This command lets you ban members of your server.
ban.userBanned: {{- member }} has been banned from the server
ban.days: messages deleted in the last {{- days }} days
ban.alreadyBannedReason: It seems that {{- user }} is already banned from this guild for **{{- reason }}**!
ban.alreadyBannedNoReason: It seems that {{- user }} is already banned from this guild!

kick.description: This command lets you kick members of your server.
kick.userKicked: {{- user }} has been kicked from the server

unban.description: This command lets you unban members of your server.
unban.userUnbanned: {{- tag }} has been unbanned from the server!`
unban.noUser: I was unable to find a user with that ID!
unban.badID: You have provided a wrong ID!

vckick.description: This command lets you kick members of voice channels.
vckick.success: {{- author }} kicked {{- user }} from the **{{- oldChannelName }}** voice channel

config.description: This command is the basis to config the bot on your server.
config.failed: Failed to edit the information into the database
config.langChanged: The server language has been changed to **{{- value }}**
config.prefixChanged: The server prefix has been changed to **{{- value }}**
config.invalidLanguage: The language you provided isn't valid

ascii.description: This command translates normal text into ascii format.
ascii.queryTooBig: Please, use a text that is lower than {{- amount }} characters.
ascii.error: There was an error while trying to display the result

emoji.description: This command sends the emoji image but bigger.

say.description: Makes the bot repeat a message of your choise
say.error: You need to insert a message

language.description: This command sets my language on the server the command was used!
language.success: My language has been changed to **{{- lang }}**
language.failed:
Sadly, something wen't wrong while trying to update the server's language!
Please, try again later.
language.invalidLang:
The language you provided is invalid.
**Valid languages:** {{- botLanguages}}
language.alreadySet: My language is already set to **{{- lang }}**

exec.description: This command allows my developers to run bash code

roleinfo.noArgs: You need to either provide a role name or mention a role
roleinfo.name: Name

permissions.author: {{- name }}'s Permissions
permissions.error: You need to either provide a member or role

setnick.description: This command allows you to change the nickname of somebody
setnick.nameTooBig: The name you provided is too long! (Max: 32 characters)
setnick.failed: There was an error when I tried to change the user's nickname
setnick.success: {{- user }}'s nickname has been changed to **{{- name }}**
setnick.alreadySet: {{- user }}'s nickname is already set to **{{- name }}**!
setnick.alreadyReset: {{- user }} doesn't have a nickname already

discriminator.description: This command allows you to see the members that have the same discriminator as the one provided
discriminator.nobody: Couldn't find anyone in this server with that discriminator

role.description: This command allows you to add and remove roles from users
role.noArgs: You need to provide a user and a role
role.reasonAdd:: {{- author }} Added the role to {{- user }}
role.reasonRemove: {{- author }} Removed the role from {{- user }}
role.failedAdd: There was an error when trying to add the role to the user
role.failedRemove: There was an error when trying to remove the role from the user
role.added: {{- author }} has added the {{- role }} role to {{- member }}
role.removed: {{- author }} has removed the {{- role }} role from {{- member }}

logs.description: This command allows you to set the logs in your server
logs.edited: You have successfully set the {{ type }} channel to: {{- channel }}
